message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses lower. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10000?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to keep expenses lower, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I'm willing to negotiate further. Could we possibly agree on $12000 for the product?
